channel.title: colonial encounters on Lunaapahkiing Princeton Timetree
channel.description: Recent content in colonial encounters on Lunaapahkiing Princeton Timetree

item.title: Thomas Yong
item.description: In 1634, Lunaapeew encounter the English captain, Thomas Yong, in the area now called Princeton.

item.title: Verrazano and Hudson
item.description: Lunaapeew encounter Europeans around 1524, when Giovanni de Verrazano, an Italian, explores Lunaapahkiing. In 1609, Lunaapeew encounter Henry Hudson and his Dutch ship the Half Moon. Financed by the Dutch East India Company, Hudson claims lands along Muhheakantuck River (later named the Hudson). He reports meeting Lunaapeew along the west shore. View a depiction of Hudson’s ship, the Half Moon, by S. Hollyer in 1909.
